right.text: Not only is it that I have too many close friends in the community, I also have my responsibilities to the community. Sure, I get absolutely no recognition for what I do provide,

left.text: Oh thats for sure. But I'm probably never going to leave this community, hellhole as it may become. I'm probably never going to leave, or at least not for a while.

right.text: Well, it's honourable of you, certainly. I just got tired of the whole thing, and I'm not at a point in my life where I'll sit through that and just turn off my care.

left.text: financially and just as a friend, but I stopped caring about recognition a while ago. Its enough just to know that I'm doing some good where a lot of people have just given up.

right.text: And really, the only friends I have left in the community are you, Vlad and Nedemai. Flash as well, but it's hard to say he's part of the community.
